mapper.select: SELECT tu.id,tug.id AS groupId,tu.linkman,tu.headimg, td.unit_name AS hospital,td.sub_unit_name AS type, tu.unionid,td.title,tug.group_name FROM t_app_user tu INNER JOIN t_app_attention ta ON tu.id = ta.slaver_id LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail td ON tu.id = td.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_doctor_group tudg ON tudg.doctor_id = tu.id AND tudg.pub_user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN t_user_group tug ON tug.id = tudg.group_id AND tug.pub_user_id = tudg.pub_user_id WHERE tu.role_id = 2 AND ta.master_id = #{userId} AND tu.linkman LIKE CONCAT('%', #{linkman}, '%')

SELECT tu.id,tug.id AS groupId,tu.linkman,tu.headimg, td.unit_name AS hospital,td.sub_unit_name AS type, tu.unionid,td.title,tug.group_name FROM t_app_user tu INNER JOIN t_app_attention ta ON tu.id = ta.slaver_id LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail td ON tu.id = td.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_doctor_group tudg ON tudg.doctor_id = tu.id AND tudg.pub_user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN t_user_group tug ON tug.id = tudg.group_id AND tug.pub_user_id = tudg.pub_user_id WHERE tu.role_id = 2 AND ta.master_id = #{userId} AND tug.id is null

SELECT tu.id,tg.group_id,tu.linkman,tu.headimg,td.unit_name AS hospital,td.sub_unit_name AS type, tu.unionid,td.title,tug.group_name FROM t_app_user tu INNER JOIN t_app_attention ta ON ta.slaver_id = tu.id LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail td ON td.user_id = tu.id LEFT JOIN t_user_doctor_group tg ON tg.doctor_id = tu.id AND tg.pub_user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN t_user_group tug ON tug.id = tg.group_id WHERE tu.unionid!='' AND tu.role_id = 2 AND ta.master_id = #{userId}

SELECT tu.id,tu.province,tu.city,tu.zone,tu.mobile,tu.username, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT tm.id) FROM t_meet_attend ta INNER JOIN t_meet tm ON ta.meet_id = tm.id WHERE ta.user_id = tu.id AND tm.owner_id = #{ownerId} )AS attendCount, (SELECT SUM(usedtime) FROM t_audio_history th INNER JOIN t_meet tm ON th.meet_id = tm.id WHERE th.user_id = tu.id AND tm.owner_id = #{ownerId} )AS learnTime FROM t_app_user tu LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail td ON tu.id = td.user_id where tu.id = #{docId}

SELECT tu.id,tg.group_id,tu.linkman,tu.headimg,td.unit_name AS hospital,td.sub_unit_name AS type, tu.unionid,td.title,tug.group_name FROM t_app_user tu INNER JOIN t_app_attention ta ON ta.slaver_id = tu.id LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail td ON td.user_id = tu.id INNER JOIN t_user_doctor_group tg ON tg.doctor_id = tu.id AND tg.pub_user_id = #{userId} INNER JOIN t_user_group tug ON tug.id = tg.group_id WHERE tu.role_id = 2 AND ta.master_id = #{userId} AND tg.group_id = #{groupId}

SELECT tu.id,tu.linkman,tu.headimg,tu.unionid,tu.degree,tu.province,tu.city,tu.zone,tu.username, td.title,td.unit_name AS hospital, td.sub_unit_name AS type,tug.group_name, (SELECT count(DISTINCT tm.id) FROM t_audio_history th LEFT JOIN t_meet tm ON th.meet_id = tm.id WHERE th.user_id = tu.id AND tm.owner_id = #{ownerId} AND th.finished=1) AS finishedNum, (SELECT SUM(usedtime) FROM t_audio_history th INNER JOIN t_meet tm ON tm.id = th.meet_id WHERE th.user_id = tu.id AND tm.owner_id = #{ownerId})AS learnTime, (SELECT SUM(usedtime) FROM t_video_history th INNER JOIN t_meet t ON th.meet_id = t.id WHERE th.user_id = tu.id AND t.owner_id = #{ownerId})AS videoTime, (SELECT AVG(th.score) FROM t_exam_history th INNER JOIN t_meet tm ON th.meet_id = tm.id WHERE tm.owner_id = #{ownerId} AND th.user_id = tu.id) AS average FROM t_app_user tu LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail td ON tu.id = td.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_doctor_group tg ON tg.doctor_id = tu.id AND tg.pub_user_id = #{ownerId} LEFT JOIN t_user_group tug ON tug.id = tg.group_id WHERE tu.id = #{doctorId}
